title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 362-1.6 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 362-1.6 - Recordkeeping and reporting requirements

State Regulations
(a) In addition to the recordkeeping
requirements of section
360.19
(k) of this

Title, combustors and thermal treatment facility records must include records
of its radioactive waste detection procedures required by section
362-1.5
(b)(7)
of
this Subpart. (b) The facility must
submit an annual report as required by paragraph 360.19(k)(3) of this

Title. (c) Residue analytical
results must be submitted to the department within 30 days of receipt of the
result. The results of all ash residue analyses performed to demonstrate
compliance with section
362-1.5
(c) and the
facility's residue sampling and analysis plan required under 362-1.4(c)(4) must
be submitted, including any results that lead to the ash being reanalyzed. In
the event that the ash residue is reanalyzed, an explanation must be included
in the submittal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
362-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
